      • calculateTuition

        public static double calculateTuition(int hours,
                                      int minHoursForFees,
                                      int fees,
                                      int fullLoad,
                                      double surchargeDiscountUptoFull,
                                      double surchargeDiscountAfterFull)
        Static method to calculate student tuition
        Parameters:
        hours - int number of hours student is registered for
        minHoursForFees - int minimum number of hours required by the college for fees and services to be applied
        fees - int cost of fees
        fullLoad - int number of hours that constitues full load for student type
        surchargeDiscountUptoFull - double surcharge or discount to be applied before full time is reached
        surchargeDiscountAfterFull - double surcharge or discount to be applied after full time is reached
        Returns:
        double tuition owed
